articles.description: It was only Salvy’s second hit since returning from the Injured List, but it was a big one.
articles.content: The Royals won! That it, unequivocally, more fun to watch than a loss. Considering theyre still the worst team in the league there dont appear to be any negatives to it, either. But this was not a pa… [+3593 chars]
